import Logo from '../logo/logo' import select from './select.svg' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faQuoteLeft, faArrowLeft, faArrowRight} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './landingPage.css' const LandingPage = () => { const arrow = (e) => { let x = (e.target.parentNode).parentNode; console.log(x) let transX = parseInt(window.getComputedStyle(x).transform.split(',')[4]); transX = (e.target.classList.contains('arrowleft')) ? transX-150:transX+150; x.querySelector('.users').transform = `translateX(${transX}px)`; } const isOnScreen = (el) => { return (el.getBoundingClientRect().y < window.scrollY - el.getBoundingClientRect().height/2) } const clickNav = (e) => { document.querySelectorAll(".nav a li").forEach(el => { if (el.classList.contains('active')) el.classList.toggle('active') }) if (!e.target.classList.contains('active')) e.target.classList.toggle('active') } document.addEventListener('scroll',()=>{ document.querySelectorAll('.counter').forEach(el => { if (isOnScreen(el) && !el.classList.contains('done')){ el.classList.add('done'); let h = el.querySelector('.h'); let t = el.querySelector('.t'); let o = el.querySelector('.o'); let c = el.querySelector('.c'); let numbers = [h,t,o]; let data = el.getAttribute('data-number'); let timer = setInterval(()=>{ numbers.forEach(x => { x.innerHTML = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10); }) },50) setTimeout(() => { clearInterval(timer); for(let i=0;i
